scripts.deep-clean: pnpm --recursive exec rimraf node_modules && pnpm --recursive exec rimraf dist && rimraf packages/shared/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && pnpm store prune
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run migrate && pnpm run deploy:workers
scripts.deploy:dev: pnpm run build && pnpm run deploy:workers:dev
scripts.deploy:workers: pnpm --filter notification run deploy && pnpm --filter payment run deploy && pnpm --filter chat-worker run deploy && pnpm --filter worker run deploy
scripts.migrate: pnpm --filter worker exec wrangler d1 migrations apply gutter_db --env production
scripts.migrate:dev: pnpm --filter worker exec wrangler d1 migrations apply gutter_db --local
